Any reproduction of computer software, computer software documentation, or portions thereof marked with this legend must also reproduce the markings. ID of an object, 128 bits The high 32-bit of daos_obj_id_t::hi are reserved for DAOS, the rest is provided by the user and assumed to be unique inside a container.
Definition at line 39 of file daos_obj.h.
